content: this listing is for the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern at theturtletrunk com this pattern is for a large 6 x 4 72 x 48 crochet blanket that looks like the american flag this blanket features a chevron design and textured surface this blanket would make a wonderful gift for any patriots or veterans you may know pattern includes -detailed instructions for a crochet blanket and star -gauge pattern -link to free video tutorial difficulty advanced beginner yarn used medium weight 4 hook size j / 6 00 mm standard us crochet terms
